definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: One important syntactic function of preposition phrases is to be the adverbial before subject.
sentences.chinese: 作句首狀語是部分介詞短語的重要句法功能。

sentences.english: There is no consensus yet on the nature of the sentence initial nominal element in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 漢語的句首名詞性成分到底是什麼，至今尚無定論。

sentences.english: Is capitalized only because it is the first word in a sentence, it is extracted in normalized form.
sentences.chinese: 僅因其是句首詞而大寫，則將以規範化形式提取它。

sentences.english: Writing carefully, dangling participles must be avoided.
Rule 5. A mixed fraction can be expressed in figures unless it is the first word of a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 混合型的分數可以用阿拉伯數字表達除非它位於句首。

sentences.english: Locality phrases or time phrases are often used as the adverbial adjunct at the beginning of the sentence.
sentences.chinese: 存現句的句首狀語一般是表示處所和時間的詞語。

sentences.english: Do not start a sentence with a coordinating conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 不要在句首使用並列連詞。

sentences.english: This phrase is often used as a parenthesis, which appears at the beginning or in the middle of a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 這個短句一般用做插入語，位於句首或句中。

sentences.english: Is capitalized only because it is the first word in a sentence , it is extracted in normalized form.
sentences.chinese: 僅因其是句首詞而大寫，則將以規範化形式提取它。

definition: inversion (rhetoric device of inverting the word order for heightened effect)/anastrophe
